q1: How bad are Italy these days?
q2: Who did Italy lose to this world cup?
a2: Italy didn't qualify to play in the world cup this year losing to Israel.
a3: It seems crazy, but a real argument can be made that goalkeeper Gianluigi Buffon is the greatest Italian player of all time.
a4: Italy will win the next world cup
q5: What are the odds of Italy winning the next World Cup?
a5: They have to qualify first. Once they're in, Italy can always compete.
